title: Trivial Ties
description: In a world where the rules are gray and the Don's word is a law unto itself, only one thing is sacred… family.Tanner Wong was in the wrong place at the right time to help another omega in distress. When the only way to save the man is to knock at the front gates of one of the most powerful mafiosos in the city, Tanner didn’t hesitate. Afterall, his middle name is Danger.What he didn’t expect to find on his errand of mercy was his heart’s desire: a mate and the family that came with him.Ivan Novak wasn’t looking for a mate. His mind was focused on finding the losers who thought it was okay to attack his family and kidnap Pavlo Stanislav, who was supposed to be under the Novaks’ care.Nothing else mattered but finding those people. At least, not until he scented his fated mate.Fate has a funny way of picking the worst moments to bring mates together… or maybe the timing couldn’t be better? While Ivan learns how to be a good alpha to his mate, the Novak family is facing an unknown enemy set on pitting the ruling factions of Chicago against each other. In a city on the verge of an all-out mafia war, the Novaks must find a way to keep the peace while also trying to get to the bottom of who is behind it all.
author: Susi Hawke
